item.title: A Quick D&D Experiment
item.description: Just a quick experiment I was curious about! A few friends and I are starting up a new D&D campaign, and a player asked me how I prefer stats for characters to be determined. I’ve always preferred point buying, but I enjoy the randomness of rolling stats. I ran some simulations to get an idea of what kind of stat distributions different rolling methods give! First, we define our functions for generating stats.
